value:
The most skillful Heroes from
all the worlds gather in this one?
What a lovely, lovely place.

I have taken up my family's
blade, which means that I am
now one with my weapon.

Point me at the strongest of this
world. My blade longs to feast
on worthy meat.

Approaching me? Here? I may take
that as a challenge someday.
Best you learn to defend yourself.

I am practicing a sword technique
that we have kept secret within
our family—to the extreme.$k$pSo, I'll do you the favor of telling
you to walk away. Unless, of
course, you wish to see it?

You must be $Nu.$k$pSo, you think yourself a friend of
$Nf? Heh.

I pile my victims to the sky so
the gods bless my blade!

My body and my blade must
get faster and fiercer!

This risks tarnishing my
blade—my body!

Lovely, lovely—I yearn to unleash
my blade!

I am Karel. Care to meet my blade?
Oh, let me withdraw the offer.
You are not ready...yet.

You are a puzzle to me. I am on
the path of the sword and cut down
those strong enough to matter.$k$pYet you cannot fight—not with a
sword, not even any magic.
Still, you are on my path.$k$pHow troubling. Why don't I just walk
around you? Why do I continue
to fight for you? Perhaps...$k$pPerhaps it is because having
you at my side propels me
faster along my path!$k$pIn any case, here we are—the
sword and the swordless!$k$pWhat else can I do but continue?
That is, until the day when I see
you standing IN my way.
はっ！
ふっ
うああっ！
...Not yet...
Feast, blade. Feast!
My blade, unrestrained!
My blood roils!
I cannot resist...the urge!
Well done.
Hmm.
Point me toward a worthy opponent.
My blade comes out at the...slightest provocation.
I was raised to live and die by the sword. Now, among my family members, I live. My sister does too.
Only one can wield the sword.
My body? My blade? We are one and the same.
I am on the path of the sword. I seek its end—one way or another.
Don't worry. My blade isn't meant for you.
Who next?
Time to feast.
